name: Instagram Clone made with React, React Router, MaterialUI and Firebase
description: My biggest project yet. It has almost every bit of functionality any social media app should have. A demo user was implemented so people can login without creating an account (but they can do that, of course). Full list of features can be read on GitHub

name: Pokemon Memory Game
description: A small memory game with the RESTful PokeAPI. The game gives the user 21 Pokemons, they have to click once on each card without repeating. If the user click on a card twice, they will lose. Pokemons change place after every click

name: Todo List
description: A Todo App where you can create, edit, mark as complete or delete a Todo

name: Shopping Cart
description: A Fake Store with a cart. You can add or delete items from it, modify the amount of items or empty the cart
